channel.title: Concerning my server and the no-ip duc
channel.description:
Okay so I have successfully (or so i think) portforwarded and i can log into my server with the no-ip address, but when my friend trys to log in it gives him an error. I tested to see and it did in fact give an error, my brothers laptop got in tho. (assuming its local network only right now)
so my question is, how would i allow others (not only local) log into the server. (my ports are open, and i can log in through the no-ip address [servername.no-ip.biz]
My regards,
Elegance
Fastest Contact Information: Skype: Joeyy.Jamess (Always logged in) [Most effective way of communication] Email: Laughridgejj@go.wpcc.edu (checked often)

item.title: Concerning my server and the no-ip duc
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

google port checker 43594 im guessing check if its open. im guessing its not, if it gets correctly portforwarded you have to connect with 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
